remarks.format: ## Remarks 仅`destinationType`的返回源自此实现的值。Only a `destinationType` of returns a value originating from this implementation. 为提供的任何其他类型`destinationType`导致此方法调用基类，这可以使得中没有可用的转换后的值，并且仅用于基本验证的剩余参数。Any other type provided for `destinationType` causes this method to call base, which results in no usable converted value and only serves for basic validation of the remaining parameters.
